column10: Content dependent <ref name="ContDep">Content Dependent (System) refers to a system which attempts to detect the dominant type of files in that folder and then select the most appropriate view mode for you automatically.</ref>

column16: (show tab-bar optional) <ref>Tab-bar mode can be activated to show the tab-bar (else it will be hidden).</ref>

column3: Text <ref>The text interface  which can be partially graphical with some plugins  such as embedded image/video viewers  for example. But the text interface is only emulated with the ConEmu mod - it is graphical and TrueColor in reality.</ref>
column4: <ref name="With the ConEmu mod or plugins">With the ConEmu mod or plugins</ref>
